text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Tunisia and the European Union signed on margins of Euro-Mediterranean forum in Malta this week a financial agreement for professsional training.
- Tunisian businessmen plan to make offers for a tender Libya is expected to launch soon for the setting up of small textiles firms.
- Parliament recently adopted a law lifting the state's monopoly on insuring exports.
- One of Tunisia's major keys for growth at the start of the next century is the integration into Euro-Mediterranean area.
